1.title: Sze Yap Bot Help Pages!
1.name: Sze Yap Taishanese Dictionary Bot
1.value:
Hello there! It's me, Do-En! I'm a dictionary bot based on [Gene Chin's Hoisanva English Dictionary](https://sites.fitnyc.edu/users/gene_chin/hed/index.htm) and [Stephen Li's Taishanese Dictionary](https://stephen-li.com/WebTemplates/greencreative/taishanese.html)
React with the arrows to see the commands!
You can also use commands in a DM channel with the bot!

If you are still confused after reading this guide or want to talk join the [Du-Ein support server!](https://discord.gg/mbw7rZkPG4)

Special thanks to [suspiciouscactus](https://github.com/suspiciouscactus) for an extract of Stephen Li's dictionary.
This bot is inspired by Kaoffie's Yulin Bot! [Go check out their github!](https://github.com/Kaoffie)

2.title: Help Commands
2.name: {prefix}gc ***word***
2.value:
Use {prefix}gc ***word*** to search [Gene Chin's Hoisanva English Dictionary](https://sites.fitnyc.edu/users/gene_chin/hed/index.htm)
__Examples:__
English Search: {prefix}gc dictionary
Chinese Search: {prefix}gc 字典, {prefix}gc 樂
Pinyin Search: {prefix}gc lok32 (only supports single word search)

3.title: Help Commands
3.name: {prefix}sl ***word***
3.value:
Use {prefix}sl ***word*** to search [Stephen Li's Taishanese Dictionary](https://stephen-li.com/WebTemplates/greencreative/taishanese.html)
__Examples:__
English Search: {prefix}sl break
Chinese Search: {prefix}sl 樂

4.title: Help Commands
4.name: {prefix}penyim ***word***
4.value:
Use {prefix}penyim ***word*** to convert chinese characters to penyim
__Examples:__
{prefix}penyim 可以嗎

5.title: Help Commands
5.name: {prefix}leave_channel
5.value: Use {prefix}leave_channel to tell the bot to leave the channel you are currently in

6.title: Help Commands
6.name: {prefix}pause
6.value:
Pause audio that is currently playing
Requires you be in the same vc as the bot

7.title: Help Commands
7.name: {prefix}hoisan_sauce
7.value: Play a random hoisan sauce youtube video! use +pause to stop the audio!

8.title: Picture Credits
8.name: Most of the pictures provided by Ace Dystopia#2150!

9.title: Sze Yap Bot
9.name: Sze Yap Bot created by pigpigchui#0753
